name: Level 2 The Virus Master
description: Singing monstrosities seek your destruction in this blitz of art and action based on the tracks 'Coded to Fail' and 'Taking Control' by the progressive metal band 'Last Chance to Reason'. This barrage of musically synchronized boss battles marries the classic SHUMP to modern musical sensibilities to create a unique audio/visual experience. A lot of work went into the singing animations and action synchronization, show us some love with a donation!
